entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening then snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near Lake Louise. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
